name: Hei
description:
Hei is a point-and-click adventure game with lots of puzzles and a unique artistic style.

Join Hei, a being with humanoid appearance, in his adventure to find the sacred tree. Explore four different levels, each one with
its own peculiarities. Meet a great variety of curious characters.

Inspired in the magnificent adventure games of the studies Amanita Design (Machinarium, Botanicula, etc...) and Double Fine (Broken Age, Grim Fandango, etc...).
And in games like Boombang and No.5.
